subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Jack Fleck, who defeated Ben Hogan at the 1955 United States Open, is 90 now, the tournament’s oldest living champion and still an avid golfer.
snippet: Jack Fleck, who defeated Ben Hogan at the 1955 United States Open, is 90 now, the tournament’s oldest living champion and still an avid golfer.
